column1: # "moreblocks" remix - contains almost everything from moreblocks
# Code handling moreblocks stairs has been incorporated directly into unilib's core code
# Due to the ubiquity of moreblocks, craft recipes involving only minetest_game items have been
#       added to minetest_game packages, rather than being added to a separate moreblocks package,
# moreblocks nodes marked as "deprecated" have not been imported
